column2: Gini coefficient - Household per capita income
column3: Share of top 1% - Pre-tax fiscal income (tax units, individuals)
column4: Share of top 1% - Pre-tax national income (equal-split adults)
column5: Share below R3,000 (2000 currency value) - Household per capita income
column6: Share below upper-bound poverty line - Household per capita expenditure
column7: Share of top 1% - Individual net wealth
